org.springframework.http.client.support

类 AsyncHttpAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.http.client.support.AsyncHttpAccessor
  • 直接已知子类:
    InterceptingAsyncHttpAccessor
    已过时。 
    as of Spring 5.0, with no direct replacement

    @Deprecated
public class AsyncHttpAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for AsyncRestTemplate and other HTTP accessing gateway helpers, defining common properties such as the AsyncClientHttpRequestFactory to operate on.

    Not intended to be used directly. See AsyncRestTemplate.

    从以下版本开始:
    4.0
    作者:
    Arjen Poutsma
    另请参阅:
    AsyncRestTemplate

      • createAsyncRequest

        protected AsyncClientHttpRequest createAsyncRequest(java.net.URI url,
                                                    HttpMethod method)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        已过时。 
        Create a new AsyncClientHttpRequest via this template's AsyncClientHttpRequestFactory.
        参数:
        url - the URL to connect to
        method - the HTTP method to execute (GET, POST, etc.)
        返回:
        the created request
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - in case of I/O errors
